Mayor Devine also spends her time as a history teacher in Stafford  County. She is a role model in civic leadership, both for the city of  Fredericksburg and for her students in Stafford.

Ms. BROWN. Mr. Speaker, I thank Ranking Member McGovern for yielding.

Mr. Speaker, I rise in strong opposition to this rule and the  underlying bill.

For the first time in history, this bill would force States to pay  for part of SNAP benefits, and it would require States to increase  their share of administrative costs.

This is an unfunded mandate,…
